meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cannibals.
meanings.sent1: The cannibalistic tribe was known for their unusual eating habits.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted a cannibalistic character who preyed on unsuspecting victims.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the idea of a cannibalistic monster under their beds.
meanings.sent4: His cannibalistic gaze made her feel uneasy, as if he could devour her with his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The author's vivid description painted a cannibalistic picture of the ancient ritual.

meanings.definition: Involving the practice of eating the flesh of one's own species.
meanings.sent1: The cannibalistic act shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent2: The survival story featured a group resorting to cannibalistic behavior to stay alive.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cannibalistic potluck dinner made everyone chuckle nervously.
meanings.sent4: The cannibalistic nature of the crime scene left the investigators speechless.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting depicted a hauntingly cannibalistic scene of desperation.

meanings.sent1: The cannibalistic gestures of the actor added depth to his performance.
meanings.sent2: The novel's antagonist displayed cannibalistic tendencies towards his rivals.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke about a cannibalistic fashion trend left the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her cannibalistic competitiveness in sports often intimidated her opponents.
meanings.sent5: The documentary captured the cannibalistic rituals of a remote tribe with unsettling clarity.
